summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2056, for the improvement of King Street, from Ninth Avenue South to Twelfth Avenue South, and Tenth Avenue South, from King Street to Weller Street, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same with a plank roadway forty-two (42) feet in width, with a twelve (12) foot walk on each side thereof, under Ordinance No. 20608, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
